tool.name: CreateKGfromJSON

param.name: Input_backup_folder
param.dialogReference: Select the input folder containing the backup files.

param.name: New_knowledge_graph_name
param.dialogReference: Provide the name of the new knowledge graph. The default value will be the name of the input backup folder, which is either derived from a knowledge graph or manually provided.

param.name: Upload_item details
param.dialogReference:
If checked, the item details provided in the backup files will be used to update these details after the service is created: title, snippet (summary), description, tags, and thumbnail. Verify the necessary data is in the provided folder: a PNG file and an itemDetails.json file.

If unchecked, the item details will not be updated.

tool.summary: This tool creates a new knowledge graph from a backup created using the Backup Knowledge Graph as JSON tool.
tool.usage: Use this tool to create a new knowledge graph from a backup. This tool connects to your enterprise portal via your ArcGIS Pro active portal connection.
